radiographic_examinations.findings: Scarring/atelectasis at the right lung base; no pleural or pericardial effusion; no focal liver lesions; normal pancreas and spleen; diverticulosis of the sigmoid colon; inflammation at the base of the cecum; a 1.3 cm structure at the base of the cecum that may represent an inflamed diverticulum; wall thickening at the base of the cecum; small adjacent reactive lymph nodes; multiple prominent mesenteric lymph nodes in the right lower quadrant; mild atherosclerotic disease; multilevel degenerative changes in lumbar spine with DISH; no acute fracture.
